alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Estill and western Lee Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blackburn, or near Irvine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Irvine, Station Camp, Wisemantown, South Irvine and West Irvine around 805 PM EDT. Ravenna, Wagersville and Doe Creek around 810 PM EDT. Alumbaugh, Drip Rock and Pryse around 815 PM EDT. Evelyn, Leighton, Shade and Texola around 820 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Willow Shoals, Pinnacle, Yellow Rock, Old Landing, Whynot, Crystal and Banford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
